lom:description.lom:string: Practical Uses of Math and Science (PUMAS) is a collection of one-page examples of how math and science topics taught in K-12 classes can be used in interesting settings, including everyday life. The examples are written primarily by scientists and engineers, and are available to teachers, students, and other interested parties via the PUMAS Web Site.

lom:title.lom:string: Practical Uses of Math and Science, Subtitle: The On-line Journal of Math and Science Examples for Pre-College Education
